paint_overhaul.other

Class FXMLPaintController

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint_overhaul.other.DefaultController
      • paint_overhaul.other.FXMLPaintController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class FXMLPaintController
extends DefaultController

    FXMLPaintController is the base class for the whole program. This class is the controller for pain(t). It implements all functions needed to create a functioning version of MS Paint. This class references all tags created in the .fxml file and creates local variables to store data in. This class also references all actions created in the .fxml file.

    Since:
    1.0

      • handleOpen

        public void handleOpen()
        FXML Function to handle opening a file. This function opens a file using the file chooser, loads it into the canvas, and enables the zoom buttons.
        See Also:
        BetterFileChooser.getFileChooser(), PaintCanvas.loadImageFromFille(File)

      • handleSave

        public void handleSave()
        FXML Function to handle saving a file. If a file hasn't been saved before, the function will fire the save as button. Otherwise, it saves the image to the previously saved file.
        See Also:
        handleSaveAs(), PaintCanvas.saveCanvasToFile(File)

      • handleSaveAs

        public void handleSaveAs()
        FXML Function to handle save as functionality. Opens the file chooser to get a location for the file. Then, the file is saved to the location.
        See Also:
        BetterFileChooser.getFileChooser(), PaintCanvas.saveCanvasToFile(File)

      • configureWidthSpinner

        public void configureWidthSpinner(javafx.scene.control.Spinner spinner)
                           throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Configures the width spinner object. Sets the values to only be integers. It also formats the text and watches for users not hitting enter. It sets the line width to the new value.
        Parameters:
        spinner - Spinner that is being analyzed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - in case user enters unexpected values

      • configurePolygonSpinner

        public void configurePolygonSpinner(javafx.scene.control.Spinner spinner)
                             throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Configures the polygon spinner object. Sets the values to only be integers. It also formats the text and watches for users not hitting enter. It sets the number of polygon sides to the new value
        Parameters:
        spinner - Spinner that is being analyzed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - in case user enters unexpected values

      • configureFontSizeSpinner

        public void configureFontSizeSpinner(javafx.scene.control.Spinner spinner)
                              throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Configures the font size spinner object. Sets the values to only be integers. It also formats the text and watches for users not hitting enter. It sets the font size to the new value
        Parameters:
        spinner - Spinner that is being analyzed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - in case user enters unexpected values
